p: Conversion of arachidonic acid to biologically active leukotrienes, a potent mediators of inflammatory reactions is a key point when looking for new molecules that can inhibit inflammatory events. Plant domain is a valuable source for new 5-LOX and dual 5-LOX/COX-inhibitors, because they are fundamentally rich in flavonoids compound [ 36]. In past, Wagner and colleagues demonstrate that Anacardium occidentale L. strongly inhibited prostaglandin synthase, but nobody evaluated these activities in vivo [ 94]. Our results demonstrate that cashew nuts decrease inflammation probably across to the modulation of 5-LOX and Cox-2.
